citations.narrative:
The adult dogs at the facility are not up to date on distemper and parvovirus vaccinations. The last recorded date the
vaccinations were given was January 4, 2021. The Program of Vet Care prescribes for these vaccinations to be given
yearly. Distemper and parvovirus are contagious diseases of dogs that may cause vomiting, anorexia, dehydration,
neurological symptoms, lethargy, and possibly death. It is also important for nursing mothers to be up to date on these
vaccinations as they will pass immunity to the puppies through their milk. Correct by ensuring vaccinations for contagious
and/or deadly diseases of dogs (including distemper and parvovirus) be performed in accordance with a schedule
approved by the attending veterinarian (yearly). Correct by: January 1, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The adult dogs at the facility are not up to date on distemper and parvovirus vaccinations. The last recorded date the 
vaccinations were given was January 4, 2021. The Program of Vet Care prescribes for these vaccinations to be given 
yearly. Distemper and parvovirus are contagious diseases of dogs that may cause vomiting, anorexia, dehydration, 
neurological symptoms, lethargy, and possibly death. It is also important for nursing mothers to be up to date on these 
vaccinations as they will pass immunity to the puppies through their milk. Correct by ensuring vaccinations for contagious 
and/or deadly diseases of dogs (including distemper and parvovirus) be performed in accordance with a schedule 
approved by the attending veterinarian (yearly). Correct by: January 1, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
